mapper.update: update CMS_SCENE set CS_TERMINAL = #{terminal,jdbcType=CHAR}, CS_MODULE = #{module,jdbcType=CHAR}, CS_HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CS_WIDTH = #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CS_IDENTIFICATION = #{identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CS_CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CS_CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CS_OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CS_TERMINAL, CS_MODULE, CS_HEIGHT, CS_WIDTH, CS_IDENTIFICATION, CS_NAME, CS_STATUS, CS_CREATE_TIME, CS_CREATOR, CS_OPERATE_TIME, CS_OPERATOR from CMS_SCENE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, CS_TERMINAL, CS_MODULE, CS_HEIGHT, CS_WIDTH, CS_IDENTIFICATION, CS_NAME, CS_STATUS, CS_CREATE_TIME, CS_CREATOR, CS_OPERATE_TIME, CS_OPERATOR from CMS_SCENE
